channel.title: Ideas
channel.description:
Not sure if this is the right section to post, buuuut... :|
Hey guys, I recently have released my 659 source, (Link is in my signature)
And I decided to make a V2, because I got a lot of people telling me to make a V2, (and the votes), soooooo, I'm gonna make a V2. :)
Anyways, I want to make big ass updates, like... Quests, More dungeoneering floors, and I need some more ideas to add.
For quests, please post below ideas in the following format:
Quest Name: Quest info: Quest Rewards: Member or Non member quest?: Additional information: [b](don't have to do this one)[/b]
And any other idea that pops into your mind, but make sure to give detail about it. Hopefully, maybe The mezzyscape owner wants to team up and make a V2, I can come out faster.
Thanks, hit me back!

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:8, topic:440697”][quote author=frozon566 link=topic=543372.msg3983707#msg3983707 date=1335623042]
I wanna play:

Quest Name: “MoparIsAlmostTheBest”
Quest info: defeat the evil wizard who is holding MITB hostage.
Quest Rewards: Mopar Gloves: +5 str +10 slash
Member or Non member quest?: Member
Additional information: evil wizard’s name is Lothy.
[/quote]
Me gusta.

Quest #2:
Quest Name: “Hammer Time”
Quest info: Regain Possession of david’s ban hammer from the evil Miss Silabsoft.
Quest Rewards: Ban hammer: Ban whoever the fuck you want, when you want.
Member or Non member quest?: Member
Additional information: Miss Silabsoft will crash unexpectedly.[/quote]

LMFAAAAAOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO shiiit that was the best birthday gift :’)

anyways , I need acceptable quests -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:3, topic:440697”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=543372.msg3982463#msg3982463 date=1335461445]
Mezzyscape has like 15 projects hes in atm. Plus he sucks. I don’t know why people worship him.
[/quote]
Noobs are like a gravitational force, they attract to each other.[/quote]
You, sir, just gave me a great sig.

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

If you’re trying so hard to emulate RuneScape by following their shitty trail of revision updates, why are you striving for creativity within content? That seems stupid. Take everything but their content, which in my opinion, is the only thing they did right.

Emulate their quests too.

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

Tutorial:

Noobs are like a gravitational force, they attract to each other.

Ba dum tss.

ON TOPIC ; I need ideas guys, not disrespect.

RiiPiiNFtW:

Mezzyscape has like 15 projects hes in atm. Plus he sucks. I don’t know why people worship him.

Dude, this guy is how I got my source , so please don’t hate on him , cause I respect him like fuck , he helped me a lot , and if you think he’s bad, please, I would like to see you do projects like him. ESPECIALLY the 659.

Read full topic

item.description:
@goudont wrote:

Not sure if this is the right section to post, buuuut…

Hey guys, I recently have released my 659 source, (Link is in my signature)

And I decided to make a V2, because I got a lot of people telling me to make a V2, (and the votes), soooooo, I’m gonna make a V2.

Anyways, I want to make big ass updates, like… Quests, More dungeoneering floors, and I need some more ideas to add.

For quests, please post below ideas in the following format:

Quest Name:
Quest info:
Quest Rewards:
Member or Non member quest?:
Additional information: (don’t have to do this one)

And any other idea that pops into your mind, but make sure to give detail about it. Hopefully, maybe The mezzyscape owner wants to team up and make a V2, I can come out faster.
